solution_line_template: We know Claire has spent a total of {total_hours_in_day} hours in a day - {cleaning_hours} hours cleaning - {cooking_hours} hours cooking - {sleeping_hours} hours sleeping = {crafting_and_tailoring_hours} hours crafting and tailoring.

Since she split her time equally, she must have spent {crafting_and_tailoring_hours} hours * {split_factor} = <<{crafting_and_tailoring_hours}*{split_factor}={crafting_hours}>>{crafting_hours} hours crafting.
